participant_1.background:
I'm not the healthiest person, but I do enjoy touring with Frank Ocean and I love ice cream.
I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work.
my major is in business administration.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
I'm still looking for someone to share my life with.

participant_2.background:
I'm not really into hobbies, but I love to play board games with my family.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
I make my living as a professional bowler.
I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier.
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.

content.text: Hi there, how are you?
Hey, I'm doing great! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a professional archer and I tour with Frank Ocean.
Wow, that's awesome! I've always wanted to try archery.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be really challenging.
I bet it is. How did you get into it?
I started when I was a kid. My parents loved to do it, so they took me with them.
That's great. Do you enjoy touring with Frank Ocean?
I do! He's a great guy and it's a lot of fun to travel and perform with him.
What's your favorite part of the job?
I think my favorite part is getting to see different places and meet new people.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
It is!
So, what are you looking for in a partner?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent.
That sounds like a good list of qualities.
Yeah, I think so.
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to play video games and I'm also really into archery.
I like to play video games too! What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into first-person shooters right now.
I'm not really into first-person shooters, but I do like to play some other games.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into role-playing games and puzzle games.
I've never really played any role-playing games, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! They're a lot of fun.
I might have to check them out.
